entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.Player

  • public class Player
extends Entity
    The player character that can move, punch, and die

      • Player

        public Player(float x,
              float y,
              com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer map,
              Entity e)
        Player Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - The player's starting horizontal location
        y - The Player's starting vertical location
        map - The map that the player is placed on
        e - An entity object for entities to track. Player will not use this variable
